meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of mats.
meanings.sent1: The maty floor felt soft under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The cat enjoyed lying on the maty rug.
meanings.sent3: The maty grass tickled my toes as I walked through the garden.
meanings.sent4: The maty blanket provided warmth and comfort on the chilly night.
meanings.sent5: The maty texture of the fabric made it cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Resembling a mat in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her hair was maty and tangled after a long day at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The old book had a maty cover that showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The maty paint on the wall gave it a unique and rustic look.
meanings.sent4: The maty surface of the rock made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent5: The maty pattern on the fabric added a touch of charm to the room.

meanings.definition: To cover or furnish with mats.
meanings.sent1: I will maty the picnic area before our friends arrive.
meanings.sent2: She decided to maty the floor to protect it from scratches.
meanings.sent3: He tried to maty the roof with leaves for a natural look.
meanings.sent4: The gardener will maty the pathway with stones for a decorative touch.
meanings.sent5: They plan to maty the walls with bamboo for a tropical feel.
